content.rendered:
JOHNSON ANDREWS

Mortgage Agent

Level 2

  • 647.268.9589
  • johnson@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • Toronto, GTA and Niagara Region

Starting as a Credit Analyst, Johnson Andrews quickly discovered his desire to guide homebuyers through the mortgage process. More than just a transaction, Johnson is committed to simplifying this process and educating his clients every step of the way to ensure complete transparency. He prides himself on cultivating open communication and uncovering tailored solutions to meet the financial objectives of every client. At Vine Group, Johnson has successfully assisted agents and clients, funding over $500 million in residential, commercial and private mortgages in the last two years.

Johnson has been recognized as one of the Canadian Mortgage Professionals Rising Stars for 2020 and selected as a finalist for the award of Best New Agent for the 2020 Mortgage Awards of Excellence. This prestigious nomination placed Johnson as one of the five finalists out of over 1,500 nominations across Canada for this category.

Completing his Bachelor’s Degree in Finance from Brock University, Johnson continued his studies at Brock and attained a Master of Business Administration (MBA) in 2017. Upon graduation, Johnson was presented with the Goodman Graduate Award, which recognizes students who achieved exceptionally high academic standing and demonstrated leadership in school and community life. Before studying at university, Johnson played semi-professional hockey for the Niagara IceDogs and is now the team’s goal sponsor.

Client Testimonials

‘We had the best experience with Johnson at Vine Group. My husband I and we’re first time home buyers. Johnson walked us through the processes and personally checked in along the way. We felt like family! I would recommend Johnson and the Vine Group to anyone looking for mortgage assistance. Johnson was accommodating for our work schedule, tentative to our file and overall a pleasure to work with. We look forward to having him on our team with our next purchase. Thank you Johnson and the Vine Group for helping us get our dream property and home!'
– Aleigh B.
‘Johnson was very helpful along our whole process. He made himself available night and day and provided daily communication. He reached out to us every morning to provide us with updates and explained everything very thoroughly throughout the process and made things very easy. Very trustworthy and honest! Thanks again!'
– Robert C.
‘My wife and I recently had the pleasure of working with Johnson and his team. Through a seamless process, the team allowed us to access equity in our first home to secure our second home. The Vine team worked out the financing to ensure we could keep our first home as a rental property too, which is helping my family reach its financial goals. There were a lot of moving parts in this transaction and I can confidently say Johnson and his team always had answers when we needed them most. We will be using The Vine Group for our next purchase.'
– Brad N.
‘I just want to wholeheartedly thank Johnson Andrews for all his work. He made the process of purchasing a home so wonderful and easy. I highly recommend his services.'
– Shiva G.
‘Johnson goes above and beyond. He will be there for you at anytime of the day and make sure the entire process is painless. I would highly recommend using him to anyone looking for financing. Best rates, best service! 10/10 would recommend!'
– Justin B.
‘Johnson was amazing with explaining the different options with my mortgage. Johnson explained the pros and cons and directing me in the right direction so I got the best rate. I was really adamant on going with a fixed mortgage rate and Johnson advised me to go variable. He did not only say “I would do a variable”, but broke down everything for myself to understand as to why he was suggesting this. Nevertheless, I went variable and my payment dropped substantially. His professionalism and work ethic was definitely noticed. Whenever I was unsure or had a question, Johnson was quick to respond to any email I had sent him. I would most definitely use Johnson and have been sending him clients ever since.'
– Anthony P.
‘I had the pleasure of working with Johnson Andrews. A close friend of mine connected us because I was having difficulty with the bank, being self-employed. From beginning to end the experience was nothing but perfect. Johnson and his team were absolute professionals. There were no surprises and no false dreams promised. I write this review sitting in my beautiful condo eternally grateful for his efforts. Lastly, he has fantastic charisma and energy and makes you believe anything is possible. He has a client in me for life.'
– Rafael B.
Previous slide
Next slide
